Container.Name: fail2ban
Container.Overview: Fail2ban(http://www.fail2ban.org/) is a daemon to ban hosts that cause multiple authentication errors.
Container.Changes:
### 2024-03-05 - Rebase to Alpine 3.19.
### 2023-06-01 - Add optional VERBOSITY environment variable, allowing users to set the container log verbosity.
### 2023-05-25 - Rebase to Alpine 3.18, deprecate armhf.
### 2022-12-15 - Replace unmaintained ssmtp with msmtp.
### 2022-12-15 - Rebase to Alpine 3.17, Add ssmtp and whois packages. Symlink config to allow live reloading.
### 2022-08-25 - Update README to clarify remote log information.
### 2022-08-09 - Initial Release.
